articles.title: Russian President on Developing Russia-DPRK Relations of Friendship
articles.content:
Russian President on Developing Russia-DPRK Relations of Friendship 
   Moscow, January 19 (KCNA) -- The Russian Federation is interested in boosting the good-neighborly contacts with the DPRK and the relations between the two countries are developing on a high level, said President of the Russian Federation V. V. Putin, on Jan. 18, when receiving credentials from the DPRK ambassador to Russia.
 The President noted that he is very proud of maintaining the good friendship with Kim Jong Il.    
 He hoped that the Korean people would achieve good successes in all domains, in the future, too under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

Congratulations to Austrian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Austrian PM 
   Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Alfred Gusenbauer upon his appointment as prime minister of Austria.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished him success in his new job.

Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Supported in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Supported in Czech Republic 
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association in its statement on Jan. 11 wished the Korean people great success in their work to carry out the tasks set forth by the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
 The statement noted that last year the DPRK had access to a nuclear deterrent for self-defence, thus providing a firm guarantee for defending its sovereignty and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia, adding this helped the Korean people bring about a great advance in accomplishing their cause of national reunification.    
 We are of the view that the call of the joint New Year editorial for achieving the unity of the whole Korean nation serves as a means of its existence and as a driving force for achieving reunification, it said.

DPRK's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Ukraine
articles.content:
DPRK's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Ukraine
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine was formed on Jan. 15.
 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse functions including a meeting, seminar and photo and book exhibition for praising the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from February 1 to April 20.    
 Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
